2417.verse: وَأَلْقِ|And throw|88|95|11508$مَا|what|53|67|262$فِى|(is) in|58|72|89$يَمِينِكَ|your right hand;|127|141|11509$تَلْقَفْ|it will swallow up|131|145|11510$مَا|what|53|67|262$صَنَعُوٓاْ‌ۖ|they have made.|132|139|8411$إِنَّمَا|Only|55|69|102$صَنَعُواْ|they (have) made|139|168|8411$كَيْدُ|a trick|62|91|11511$سَـٰحِرٍ‌ۖ|(of) a magician|120|149|8257$وَلَا|and not|71|100|25$يُفْلِحُ|will be successful|135|149|5489$ٱلسَّاحِرُ|the magician|104|203|11512$حَيْثُ|wherever|81|280|371$أَتَىٰ|he comes."|93|192|9869$

2418.verse: فَأُلْقِىَ|So were thrown down|165|171|11513$ٱلسَّحَرَةُ|the magicians|111|124|6702$سُجَّدًا|prostrating.|97|110|550$قَالُوٓاْ|They said,|89|102|101$ءَامَنَّا|"We believe|97|110|78$بِرَبِّ|in (the) Lord|103|109|6704$هَـٰرُونَ|(of) Harun|88|333|2200$وَمُوسَىٰ|and Musa."|97|342|5792$

2419.verse: قَالَ|He said,|73|86|309$ءَامَنتُمْ|"You believe|101|126|1242$لَهُۥ|[to] him|73|98|977$قَبْلَ|before|62|88|4626$أَنْ|[that]|60|86|655$ءَاذَنَ|I gave permission|135|160|6706$لَكُمْ‌ۖ|to you.|68|81|207$إِنَّهُۥ|Indeed, he|91|97|396$لَكَبِيرُكُمُ|(is) your chief,|118|131|11514$ٱلَّذِى|the one who|103|116|138$عَلَّمَكُمُ|taught you|93|106|11515$ٱلسِّحْرَ‌ۖ|the magic.|90|103|955$فَلَأُقَطِّعَنَّ|So surely I will cut off|166|172|11516$أَيْدِيَكُمْ|your hands|93|103|4205$وَأَرْجُلَكُم|and your feet|110|131|4774$مِّنْ|of|50|71|53$خِلَـٰفٍ|opposite sides,|119|140|4940$وَلَأُصَلِّبَنَّكُمْ|and surely I will crucify you|202|223|11517$فِى|on|48|58|89$جُذُوعِ|(the) trunks|100|112|11518$ٱلنَّخْلِ|(of) date-palms|124|148|5882$وَلَتَعْلَمُنَّ|and surely you will know|181|205|11519$أَيُّنَآ|which of us|96|120|11520$أَشَدُّ|(is) more severe|128|140|711$عَذَابًا|(in) punishment|123|330|2933$وَأَبْقَىٰ|and more lasting."|139|346|11521$

2420.verse: قَالُواْ|They said,|89|101|101$لَن|" Never|68|92|524$نُّؤْثِرَكَ|we will prefer you|137|161|11522$عَلَىٰ|over|63|87|52$مَا|what|53|77|262$جَآءَنَا|has come to us|122|146|4839$مِنَ|of|50|62|156$ٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ|the clear proofs,|130|144|834$وَٱلَّذِى|and the One Who|136|163|6481$فَطَرَنَا‌ۖ|created us.|96|123|11523$فَٱقْضِ|So decree|87|114|11524$مَآ|whatever|82|109|262$أَنتَ|you|58|72|341$قَاضٍ‌ۖ|(are) decreeing.|127|136|11525$إِنَّمَا|Only|55|73|102$تَقْضِى|you can decree|123|141|11526$هَـٰذِهِ|(for) this|79|97|374$ٱلْحَيَوٲةَ|life|82|100|823$ٱلدُّنْيَآ|(of) the world.|117|126|818$

2421.verse: إِنَّآ|Indeed, [we]|106|120|120$ءَامَنَّا|we believe|90|117|78$بِرَبِّنَا|in our Lord|90|117|11527$لِيَغْفِرَ|that He may forgive|152|179|4546$لَنَا|for us|58|85|338$خَطَـٰيَـٰنَا|our sins|93|107|11528$وَمَآ|and what|82|94|46$أَكْرَهْتَنَا|you compelled us|134|159|11529$عَلَيْهِ|on it|64|89|395$مِنَ|of|50|75|156$ٱلسِّحْرِ‌ۗ|the magic.|90|115|11530$وَٱللَّهُ|And Allah|81|106|167$خَيْرٌ|(is) Best|76|88|520$وَأَبْقَىٰٓ|and Ever Lasting."|140|140|11521$

2423.verse: وَمَن|But whoever|103|111|1012$يَأْتِهِۦ|comes to Him|109|125|11532$مُؤْمِنًا|(as) a believer|116|132|4309$قَدْ|verily,|60|76|1097$عَمِلَ|he has done|101|117|10138$ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ|the righteous deeds,|157|165|239$فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|then those|92|137|777$لَهُمُ|for them|76|166|1027$ٱلدَّرَجَـٰتُ|(will be) the ranks,|145|235|11533$ٱلْعُلَىٰ|[the] high.|91|136|11340$

2424.verse: جَنَّـٰتُ|Gardens|75|83|9435$عَدْنٍ|(of) Eden|82|98|7746$تَجْرِى|flows|81|97|242$مِن|from|50|66|53$تَحْتِهَا|underneath them|133|149|243$ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ|the rivers,|88|104|244$خَـٰلِدِينَ|abiding forever|118|126|1409$فِيهَا‌ۚ|in it.|54|78|253$وَذَٲلِكَ|And that|78|126|3792$جَزَآءُ|(is) the reward|119|167|814$مَن|(for him) who|109|157|76$تَزَكَّىٰ|purifies himself.|122|146|11534$

2413.verse: They said, "O Moses, either you throw or we will be the first to throw."

2414.verse: He said, "Rather, you throw." And suddenly their ropes and staffs seemed to him from their magic that they were moving [like snakes].

2415.verse: And he sensed within himself apprehension, did Moses.

2416.verse: Allah said, "Fear not. Indeed, it is you who are superior.

2417.verse: And throw what is in your right hand; it will swallow up what they have crafted. What they have crafted is but the trick of a magician, and the magician will not succeed wherever he is."

2418.verse: So the magicians fell down in prostration. They said, "We have believed in the Lord of Aaron and Moses."

2419.verse: [Pharaoh] said, "You believed him before I gave you permission. Indeed, he is your leader who has taught you magic. So I will surely cut off your hands and your feet on opposite sides, and I will crucify you on the trunks of palm trees, and you will surely know which of us is more severe in [giving] punishment and more enduring."

2420.verse: They said, "Never will we prefer you over what has come to us of clear proofs and [over] He who created us. So decree whatever you are to decree. You can only decree for this worldly life.

2421.verse: Indeed, we have believed in our Lord that He may forgive us our sins and what you compelled us [to do] of magic. And Allah is better and more enduring."

2422.verse: Indeed, whoever comes to his Lord as a criminal - indeed, for him is Hell; he will neither die therein nor live.

2423.verse: But whoever comes to Him as a believer having done righteous deeds - for those will be the highest degrees [in position]:

2424.verse: Gardens of perpetual residence beneath which rivers flow, wherein they abide eternally. And that is the reward of one who purifies himself.
